title: Anatomy of a Businessman
brief_description: Lunch break at Ibis Traders. Midcalf dozes uneasily inside his locked office. Tilling, suspecting that Midcalf has stolen his jar of sweet onions, seeks a confrontation. A great deal can be learnt about an animal’s habits by examining the contents of its stomach.
